node.detail_zh: 患者為印傭，無外遊紀錄，沒有病徵，7 月 27 日因白血病預約入住東區醫院內科病房化療，入院時對檢測呈陰性，肺片正常。她雖有發燒，但醫生估計與白血病有關。同日僱主（第 #2979 宗個案患者）在養和醫院對檢測呈初步陽性，並轉往東區醫院，翌日確診。患者 8 月 3 日肺片正常，9 日發燒且少許肺花，13 日少許乾咳。8 月 18 至 20 日，印傭曾被安排到單人病房留醫，22 日發高燒，肺片更花，院方再安排檢測後確診。
node.detail_en: The patient is an Indian domestic helper with no recent travel history and no symptoms. On July 27, she was admitted to the Pamela Youde Nethersole Eastern Hospital internal medicine ward for chemotherapy due to leukemia. Upon admission her virus test was negative and her lungs were normal. She had a fever, which the doctor attributed to be related to the leukemia. On the same day, her employer (patient #2979) tested positive at Hong Kong Sanatorium & Hospital and was transferred to the Pamela Youde Nethersole Eastern Hospital. The diagnosis was confirmed the next day. The patient's lungs were normal on Aug 3. On Aug 9, the X-rays of her lungs were cloudy and on Aug 13, she developed a dry cough. Between Aug 18 and 20, she was arranged to stay in a single-person ward. On Aug 22, she developed high fever and the X-rays of her lungs were cloudy. The hospital arranged for subsequent testing and confirmed her diagnosis.
node.classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者
